title: Terrain Editor
html:
Settings

Terrain Types
css: #level-editor-container {     gap: 20px;     height: 50vh;     overflow: hidden;     background-color: #080815;     color: #00f0ff;     position: relative;         padding: .5em .5em 0 .5em; } #level-editor-container.show {     display: flex; }   .grid-container {   position: relative; }  /* Add these to your existing levelEditor.css file */  /* Terrain type management */ #level-editor-container .terrain-types-container {     display: flex;     flex-direction: column;     gap: 8px;     margin-top: 10px;   }      #level-editor-container .terrain-item {     display: flex;     align-items: center;     gap: 10px;     padding: 5px;     border-radius: 4px;   }      #level-editor-container .color-option {     width: 30px;     height: 30px;     border-radius: 4px;     cursor: pointer;     border: 2px solid transparent;     flex-shrink: 0;   }      #level-editor-container .color-option:hover {     opacity: 0.8;   }      #level-editor-container .terrain-label {     flex-grow: 1;   }      #level-editor-container .terrain-buttons {     display: flex;     gap: 5px;   }  .translation-controls {     position: absolute;     left: 10px;     top: 10px;     display: grid;     grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 32px);     grid-template-rows: repeat(2, 32px);     gap: 5px; } .translation-controls button {     width: 32px;     height: 32px;     font-size: 18px;     display: flex;     align-items: center;     justify-content: center;     cursor: pointer;     border-radius: 4px; } .translation-controls button span {     display: inline-block;     transform: rotate(45deg); /* Rotate arrows 45 degrees */ } #translate-up { grid-column: 2; grid-row: 1; } #translate-left { grid-column: 1; grid-row: 1; } #translate-right { grid-column: 2; grid-row: 2; } #translate-down { grid-column: 1; grid-row: 2; }  #terrain-image-editor {    border: 1px solid black;    image-rendering: pixelated;    width: 960px;    height: 480px;  }  #terrainForm .modal-content {   max-width: 960px; }  .terrain-item {   /* Your existing styles */   cursor: move; /* Shows it's draggable */   user-select: none; /* Prevents text selection while dragging */ }  .terrain-item:hover {   /* Optional: Add a hover effect to indicate draggability */   opacity: 0.8; } .canvas-container {   position: relative; }  #terrain-image-editor {   position: relative;   z-index: 1; } #terrain-grid-canvas {   image-rendering: pixelated;    position: absolute;   top: 0;   left: 0;   pointer-events: none; /* Allow clicks to pass through */   z-index: 10; /* Ensure it's above the pixel canvas */     width: 960px;   height: 480px; }  #terrain-image-display {   width: 960px;   image-rendering: pixelated; }
